pages.about-us: About Blossomly - Exquisite Fresh Flowers Perfumify HOME ABOUT US FLowers CONTACT About Blossomly At Blossomly, we are passionate about delivering the beauty of nature through our exquisite flower arrangements. Our journey began with a simple belief: flowers have the power to brighten any moment and transform spaces into vibrant sanctuaries. With a commitment to quality and craftsmanship, we handpick each bloom to ensure freshness and elegance in every bouquet. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, sending a thoughtful gesture, or simply indulging in the joy of flowers, Blossomly is here to inspire and delight. Discover the artistry of floral design with Blossomly, where each arrangement is crafted with care and creativity to enchant and captivate. Join us in celebrating life's moments with the timeless beauty of flowers. Delivery Information At Blossomly, we offer reliable and convenient delivery options to ensure your flowers arrive fresh and beautiful: Same-day delivery available for orders placed before 12 PM local time. Next-day and scheduled delivery options to fit your schedule. Nationwide delivery across the United States. Delivery Policies Delivery fees may vary based on location and delivery option selected. Orders placed after 12 PM local time will be processed for delivery on the next available day. For special requests or assistance, please contact our customer support team. Meet Our Team Jane Doe Founder & Floral Designer Jane is passionate about creating stunning floral arrangements that bring joy and beauty to every occasion. John Smith Customer Service Specialist John ensures that every customer's experience with Blossomly is exceptional and memorable. Subscribe to Our Newsletter Stay updated with the latest news, offers, and floral inspirations from Blossomly. I accept Policy & Privacy SUBSCRIBE We respect your privacy. Your email address will not be shared with third parties. The Blossomly website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Actual delivery times may vary due to factors such as weather conditions, holidays, or unforeseen circumstances. Accuracy of Information While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website, Blossomly makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. pages.privacy-policy: Blossomly - Privacy Policy Perfumify HOME ABOUT US FLowers CONTACT Blossomly Privacy Policy At Blossomly, we take your privacy very seriously. This privacy policy describes the types of information we collect from and about you when you visit our website ("Website") and use our services ("Services"), and how we use that information. Information We Collect We collect two main types of information from and about users: (1) non-personally identifiable information, and (2) personally identifiable information. Non-Personally Identifiable Information Non-personally identifiable information ("Non-PII") does not identify you as an individual. We collect Non-PII automatically when you visit our Website. This information may include: Your browser type and language Your operating system The website that referred you to us The pages you visit on our Website The links you click on our Website Your IP address The date and time of your visit We use Non-PII to understand how users navigate our Website and to improve the overall user experience. We may also aggregate Non-PII and share it with third parties for research or marketing purposes. However, this aggregated information will not be used to identify you personally. Personally Identifiable Information Personally identifiable information ("PII") is information that can be used to identify you as an individual. We only collect PII when you choose to provide it to us, such as when you: Create an account on our Website Subscribe to our newsletter Contact us through our contact form Participate in a survey or contest The type of PII we collect may include: Your name Your email address Your phone number (optional) Your company name (optional) We will never collect PII from you without your knowledge and consent. You can always choose not to provide us with PII, but doing so may limit your ability to use certain features of our Website or Services. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect from and about you for the following purposes: To provide and operate our Website and Services To process your requests and transactions To send you important information about our Website, Services, and updates To send you marketing communications (with your consent) To personalize your experience on our Website To improve the overall quality of our Website and Services To comply with legal and regulatory requirements We will never sell or share your PII with third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect Non-PII about your use of our Website. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to remember information about your visit, such as your preferences and browsing history. We use cookies to improve the functionality of our Website and to understand how users interact with it. You can choose to disable cookies in your web browser settings. However, please note that disabling cookies may limit your ability to use certain features of our Website. The Blossomly website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Blossomly Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions
